Posts.Content: Feb 19, 2008 11:07AM gwenb wrote: I am 63, three weeks out from a lumpectomy. Tomorrow is my first appt. with Oncologist. I have stage11 IDC,Â left breast,no node involvment. The tumor was 4 cm. I know partial brest radiation is supposed to be for tumors under 3 cm. However, I'm really considering not having radiation unless I can have partial breast. Any thoughts on that. I have a family history of heart disease and am reluctant to take a chance with side affects.
Posts.Title: partial breast radiation vs whole breast radiation dragongal kuchagirl
